title: How to write a business description - Quora

response.answer_text: Your Executive Summary can easily be your business description. The summary covers all the aspects of your business and it includes the following: Your backgroundYour management teamYour marketThe problem you're trying to solveYour product or service (Including tested MVP)The level of income you plan to generateThe amount of money you needExit strategyFor many people to construct a good business description you would need to have completed your whole plan Hope this helps Boomy Tokan
